summary: This is a public notice announcing the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein for alleged sex trafficking of underage girls. It states the charged conduct occurred in New York City and Palm Beach, Florida, and provides an FBI contact number for potential victims.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The subject of the public arrest notice for alleged sex trafficking of underage girls.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein has been arrested for alleged sex trafficking of underage girls.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested for alleged sex trafficking of underage girls.
The charged criminal conduct is stated to have occurred in New York City and Palm Beach, Florida.
The document is a public notice from law enforcement seeking potential victims to come forward via an FBI hotline.
